title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Work With Us
body: Work With Us         Ushers scan tickets at the Main Gate to the Filene Center. NPS Photo  Wolf Trap National Park hires many temporary summer employees. Summer employees are primarily hired to help with the summer performance seasons at the Filene Center and the Children's Theatre-in-the-Woods. Attend one of the park's Job Fairs to learn more about all of the park's summer job opportunities or visit our Employment Opportunities section. The National Park Service is an equal opportunity employer. Selections will be made solely on the basis of merit, fitness and qualifications without regard to race, sex, color, creed, age, marital status, national origin, sexual orientation, non-disqualifying handicap conditions, or any other non-merit factors.
